name: Alfred's Mansion
description:
Welcome To The Alfred's Mansion!

Alfred needs your help! his friends have been possessed by ghosts!

You will need to retrieve valuable items from his friends and burn it in order to free them!

Be careful! they are aggressive

(this mod is not canon for martin basics)

The Enemies are: Millie, Thiago and Dark Voice

You will have to run away from Millie and try to get away from her

Thiago will go faster than Millie, but you can stop him if you look at him

Dark voice will move if you see him, he will go much faster than the others, and he is the most dangerous

Also yeah this is a mod for The Laranjo's Game!

Original game: https://gamejolt.com/games/laranjo/371934
